00039 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00041 
00042 #ifndef PIZ_HASHTABLE_H
00043 #define PIZ_HASHTABLE_H
00044 
00045 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 
00048 #include "pizTypes.h"
00049 #include "pizLinklist.h"
00050 
00051 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00052 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 
00054 /**
00055  * \def     PIZ_HASHTABLE_FLAG_NONE 
00056  * \brief   (DEFAULT) Don't free items.
00057  * \ingroup hashTable
00058  */
00059  
00060 /**
00061  * \def     PIZ_HASHTABLE_FLAG_FREE_MEMORY 
00062  * \brief   Free items with \c free().
00063  * \ingroup hashTable
00064  */
00065  
00066 #define PIZ_HASHTABLE_FLAG_NONE         (0L)
00067 #define PIZ_HASHTABLE_FLAG_FREE_MEMORY  (1<<0)
00068 
00069 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 
00072 /**
00073  * \ingroup hashTable 
00074  */
00075  
00076 typedef struct _PIZHashTableElement {
00077     long key;                                   /* The key as long. */
00078     void *ptr;                                  /* Pointer to the item to store. */
00079     } PIZHashTableElement;
00080 
00081 /**
00082  * \remark  Simple hashtable with \c long keys. 
00083  *          Implemented with an array of linklists.
00084  *          To obtain the hash value : index =  key % size.
00085  * \ingroup hashTable
00086  */
00087  
00088 typedef struct _PIZHashTable {
00089     long                flags;                  /* Bit Flags. */
00090     long                count;                  /* Number of elements in the hashtable. */
00091     long                size;                   /* Number of linklists in the hashtable. */
00092     PIZLinklist         **hashTable;            /* Pointer to the hashtable's array of linklists. */
00093     } PIZHashTable;
00094 
00095 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 
00098 PIZ_START_C_LINKAGE
00099 
00100 /**
00101  * \brief   Create the hashtable.
00102  * \details The size should be a prime number, default is 157.
00103  *          In case of failure the pointer is NULL.
00104  * \param   size The size of the hashtable.
00105  * \return  A pointer to the new hashtable. 
00106  * \remark  The following shows how to create an hashtable.  
00107  * \code
00108  * PIZHashTable *hashtab = NULL;
00109  *
00110  * hashtab = pizHashTableNew (53);  
00111  * hashtab = pizHashTableNew (0);   // default value.
00112  *
00113  * \endcode 
00114  * \ingroup hashTable
00115  */
00116 PIZHashTable *pizHashTableNew (long size);
00117 
00118 /**
00119  * \brief   Set hashtable's bit flags.
00120  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00121  * \param   flags Bit flags.
00122  * \ingroup hashTable
00123  */
00124 void pizHashTableSetFlags (PIZHashTable *x, long flags);
00125 
00126 /**
00127  * \brief   Free the hashtable.
00128  * \details It is safe to pass NULL pointer. 
00129  *          Item's memory is released according to flags.
00130  * \param   x A Pointer.
00131  * \ingroup hashTable
00132  */
00133 void pizHashTableFree (PIZHashTable *x);
00134 
00135 /**
00136  * \brief   Clear the hashtable.
00137  * \details Item's memory is released according to flags.
00138  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00139  * \ingroup hashTable
00140  */
00141 void pizHashTableClear (PIZHashTable *x);
00142 
00143 /**
00144  * \brief   Add item to the hashtable.
00145  * \details The provided pointer can not be NULL. 
00146  *          Key must be superior or equal to zero.
00147  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00148  * \param   key The key.
00149  * \param   ptr A pointer to the item.
00150  * \return  An error code.
00151  * \remark  It is safe to add items with equal keys.
00152  * \ingroup hashTable
00153  */
00154 PIZError pizHashTableAdd (PIZHashTable *x, long key, void *ptr);
00155 
00156 /**
00157  * \brief   Remove an item with a given key and a given pointer.
00158  * \details Item's memory is released according to flags.
00159  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00160  * \param   key The key.
00161  * \param   ptr A pointer to the item.
00162  * \return  An error code.
00163  * \ingroup hashTable
00164  */
00165 PIZError pizHashTableRemoveByKeyAndPtr (PIZHashTable *x, long key, void *ptr);
00166 
00167 /**
00168  * \brief   Get an item with a given key.
00169  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00170  * \param   key The key.
00171  * \param   ptr The adress of a pointer to set.
00172  * \return  An error code.
00173  * \remark  In case of equal keys, older item is returned.
00174  * \ingroup hashTable
00175  */
00176 PIZError pizHashTablePtrByKey (const PIZHashTable *x, long key, void **ptr);
00177 
00178 /**
00179  * \brief   Test if the hashtable countains an item with a given key.
00180  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00181  * \param   key The key.
00182  * \return  True if found the key, otherwise false.
00183  * \ingroup hashTable
00184  */
00185 bool pizHashTableContainsKey (const PIZHashTable *x, long key);
00186 
00187 /**
00188  * \brief   Get the number of items in the hashtable.
00189  * \param   x A valid pointer.
00190  * \return  The number of items in the hashtable.
00191  * \ingroup hashTable
00192  */
00193 long pizHashTableCount (const PIZHashTable *x);
00194 
00195 PIZ_END_C_LINKAGE
00196 
00197 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00198 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00199 
00200 #ifdef PIZ_EXTERN_INLINE
00201 
00202 PIZ_EXTERN void pizHashTableSetFlags (PIZHashTable *x, long flags)
00203 {
00204     x->flags = flags;
00205 }
00206 
00207 PIZ_EXTERN long pizHashTableCount (const PIZHashTable *x)
00208 {
00209     return (x->count);
00210 }
00211 
00212 #endif // PIZ_EXTERN_INLINE
00213 
00214 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00215 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00216 #endif // PIZ_HASHTABLE_H
